description: This file defines the interface IRustBridge and its nested interface ICallback within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It outlines methods for configuring and communicating between the Thunder framework and Rust code, including remote procedure calls and event handling.

classes.name: IRustBridge
classes.description: Interface for Rust-bridge communication, supporting configuration, requests, and events.

classes.name: IRustBridge::ICallback
classes.description: Callback interface for Rust to communicate with Thunder, handling invoke, event, and response notifications.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configure the Rust bridge with the Thunder framework and callback.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Send a request from Thunder to Rust with an ID, context, method, and parameters.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Send an event from Thunder to Rust.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Rust calls this to handle a method invocation from Thunder.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Rust notifies Thunder of an event.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Rust responds to a request with a response and error code.

ctags.name: ICallback
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL ICallback : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IRustBridge
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IRustBridge : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
